directions: Beat together the mayonnaise, olive oil, Parmesan cheese, blue cheese dressing, vinegar, garlic, lemon juice, dry mustard, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, and anchovy paste (if using) in a bowl until well blended.
Cover and refrigerate for 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: 2 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
title: Ingrid's Caesar Salad Dressing
